name: ecomm-microservices
description: Practice Node.js microservices monorepo for e-commerce platform
author: Tejas Soni

scripts.bootstrap: pnpm install && pnpm run docker:up && pnpm run migrate:all && pnpm run seed:all
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter 'users' dev" "pnpm --filter 'products' dev" "pnpm --filter 'orders' dev" "pnpm --filter 'payments' dev" "pnpm --filter 'notifications' dev"
